summary: Senior Lead Technologist Editor with over 25 years of experience delivering technical support and project management in system safety and environmental health disciplines. Experienced in MIL-STD-882 system safety programs, PESHE, policy analysis, environmental planning, regulatory compliance, and DoD program oversight. Retired from the U.S. Navy, certified Navy Principal for Safety, and holder of a TOP SECRET clearance.

experience.title: Senior Lead Technologist Editor
experience.description: Led and supported system safety and ESOH programs for DoD clients; authored ESOH guidance in SEP and JCIDS; contributed to MIL-STD-882 updates; provided program management, mentoring, and cross-functional collaboration on DoD projects.

experience.title: Environmental Scientist
experience.description: Provided program management, technical and regulatory analysis support to Navy pollution prevention initiatives; performed P2 opportunity assessments, technology transfer, and life-cycle cost analyses; supported Navy weapon system environmental planning.

experience.title: Chief Aviation Support Equipment Technician
experience.description: Managed Environmental and Safety Programs for Navy Management Systems Support Office and USS Forrestal; performed hazardous materials management and waste reduction; supported NALCOMIS system upgrades and deployment; led site surveys, hardware/software procurements, and training.
